attributes.action: convitctions for those found bullying someone to suicide
attributes.additional_details:
As of 2013 many young people espically teenagers have been a victim of bullying.

By signing this petion i would like to see serious charges put against those people found involved in bullying a person who has committed suicide and for the Goverment to charge people with either manslaughter or murder depending on the evidence

Many people get bullied to the extent where they think taking their own life is the only way out. If you look in the papers you will find it a daily occurence of people taking thier lifes due to bullying.

stop bullying.
